00003 #ifndef _ORTrigger32ClockDecoder_hh_
00004 #define _ORTrigger32ClockDecoder_hh_

00006 #include "ORVBasicTreeDecoder.hh"
00007 #include "ORVEventCounterDecoder.hh"
00008 
00009 class ORTrigger32ClockDecoder : public ORVBasicTreeDecoder, 
00010                                 public ORVEventCounterDecoder
00011 {
00012   public:
00013     ORTrigger32ClockDecoder() {}
00014     virtual ~ORTrigger32ClockDecoder() {}
00015 
00016     virtual inline UInt_t EventTriggerBitsOf(UInt_t* record)
00017       { return (record[1] & 0x003000000) >> 24; }
00018     virtual inline UInt_t MacTimeTopBitsOf(UInt_t* record)
00019       { return record[1] & 0x000ffffff; }
00020     virtual inline UInt_t MacTimeBottomBitsOf(UInt_t* record)
00021       { return record[2]; }
00022     virtual inline ULong64_t MacTimeOf(UInt_t* record)
00023       { return (((ULong64_t) MacTimeTopBitsOf(record)) << 32) 
00024                 + MacTimeBottomBitsOf(record); }
00025     virtual inline double GetMacTime_s(UInt_t* record)
00026       { return double(MacTimeOf(record)) * 1.0e-7; }
00027 
00028     // for basic trees
00029     virtual inline size_t GetNPars() { return 3; }
00030     virtual std::string GetParName(size_t iPar);
00031     virtual UInt_t GetPar(UInt_t* record, size_t iPar, size_t /*iRow*/);
00032 
00033     // for event counters
00034     virtual inline size_t GetEventCount(UInt_t* /*record*/) { return 1; }
00035 
00036     virtual inline std::string GetDataObjectPath() 
00037       { return "ORTrigger32Model:10MHz Clock Record"; }
00038 };

00040 #endif
